name: Effekseer Model
summary: Learn about .EFKMODEL files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Effekseer is a free application for generating particle effect animations for 2D and 3D games or for sharing animations online. The application comes with EFKMODEL files and enables you to create custom models.

EFKMODEL files included with Effekseer can be found in the "Models" folder within the model folder in the "Sample" folder. For example, the MergedSphere.efkmodel file is located in the Sample\​00_MaterialBasic\​Models directory.

instructions: You can only open an EFKMODEL file with Effekseer (multiplatform). To open an EFKMODEL file, follow these steps:
Select Model from the top dropdown menu in the "Render Settings" window
Choose File from the dropdown menu in the "Model" section
Click Load and choose the EFKMODEL file

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
